Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageHandler, TextualUI
public abstract class VirtualView extends Observable implements View
Abstract class representing a virtual view that is runnable. Subclasses of VirtualView are responsible for implementing the run method (e.g. TextualUI).
